main_definition: Wellness refers to the overall state of being healthy, both physically and mentally, in which an individual actively works towards achieving a balanced lifestyle that promotes good health.

meanings_and_examples.example: Regular exercise like jogging or swimming can improve one's physical wellness by strengthening the body and reducing the risk of chronic diseases.
Practicing mindfulness meditation or seeking therapy helps in maintaining mental wellness by managing stress and enhancing emotional health.
Eating a balanced diet, getting enough sleep, exercising regularly, and staying hydrated are all part of achieving holistic wellness that involves caring for the body in its entirety.
A company might provide gym memberships or stress management workshops as part of their workplace wellness programs to help employees maintain good health and reduce absenteeism.
